    No Longer - 25-02-16

    🌐 Browser: Arc (desktop), Arc Search (iOS)
    📨 Mail Client: Outlook for Mac / web (work), Gmail for iOS / web (personal) 📆 Calendar: Outlook for Mac / web (work), Google Calendar for iOS / web (personal)
    💬 Chat: Telegram 🔐 Password Management: 1Password

    No Longer - 24-03-08

    ✅ To-Do: Wrike (work): Never have I had to work so hard to do so little…
    ✅ To-Do: Digital planner from Emma Studies (personal): My iPad has been turned into a cross-stitch pattern manager and I have stopped carrying it with me. Not missing it at the moment, but I adore Emma’s work and if you’re interested in digital planning that is a bit more evocative of physical planning (think fun fonts, stickers, etc.), I’d recommend checking out her work.
    🍴 Meal Planning: Platejoy: Not currently meal planning. Probably should be…
    💰 Budgeting and Personal Finance: YNAB: My partner hates apps. If it isn’t available in a browser, it might as well not exist. If we’re going to have a shared system, it needs a web version.
    🎵 Music:  Music: I got jealous of all my buddies with their cool Spotify daylists with the cool names.
    🎤 Podcasts:  Podcasts: See above.
